message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small chunk, but I think I deserve more
I'll give you a bigger chunk, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm not going to give up yet!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of again!
I'll give you a tiny fraction, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm really struggling to make ends meet!
I'll give you a tiny crumb, but I'm not giving up yet!
